#Text=Taipei Computer Association - a key player at IT industry and exhibition in Taiwan
#Text=Wednesday , October 24 , 2007

#Text=From October 22 to 25 , Taipei Computer Association ( TCA ) promoted three organized or sponsored expositions including " 2007 WiMAX Forum Taipei Showcase & Conference " , " Exhibition of the First 5-year Period of the National Science & Technology Program of e-Learning " , and " 2007 IP Comm Asia " showing great determination on improving the IT industry in Taiwan .

column1: #Text=With Computex Taipei 2008 will add Taipei World Trade Center Nangang Exhibition Hall ( TWTC Nangang ) area , how TCA transform their ways and goals with operating their IT shows ?
#Text=It will be affected on the notibility of domestic or trade shows .

#Text=For the three expos status and TWTC Nangang topics , Wikinews Reporter Brock interviewed TCA Secretary General Enoch Du for some important questions that should be respected by organizers and governments .
#Text=Interview
#Text=We saw three expos continuously appeared this week and witnessed the determination from TCA .

#Text=But before the three expos , with the 2008 Computex Taipei Local Exhibitors ' Coordination by TAITRA last month for the exhibition hall usage , what should TCA face on the twin halls ( TWTC Hall 1 and TWTC Nangang ) problem ?
#Text=How to solve the problem with TWTC Nangang ?

#Text=Because more than ten years before , when Computex Taipei exhibited at Sungshan and TWTC halls , the show did n't have a good work , and I 've asked Commissioner of Department of Transportation in Taipei City Hsiao-hsien Lou for the traffic issue with TWTC Nangang , he looked it as a pessimistic way .

#Text=We still contact with TAITRA currently for the twin halls issue , The advantage for TWTC Nangang is exhibition spaces , but to the opposite way , traffic is surely a great headache for governments , organizers , and exhibitors .
#Text=We still try to solve problems with this .

#Text=Even though Computex Taipei will be located at TWTC Exhibition Hall and TWTC Nangang same time with the plan of TAITRA , but without solving problems , Computex Taipei will still be in a trouble even though we want to challenge the World 's 1st scale against CeBIT .
#Text=It 's apparently that lots of organizations care about the traffic near TWTC Nangang .
#Text=By the way , for the 1st time TCA holding 2007 IP Comm Asia , why should it be transformed from a long-historical trade show - Taipei Telecom by TAITRA , suspended from this year ?
#Text=TCA explained some reasons for the transformation in the starting of 2007 .

#Text=In fact , lots of famous local participants ( exhibitors ) usually promoted their products with show-girls ( models ) so the quality of Taipei Telecom went from bad to worse in past 2 to 5 years .
#Text=This is surely a damn bad demonstration in Taiwan 's society .

#Text=With suspending Taipei Telecom and promoting IP telecommunication industry in Taiwan , TCA finally decided to hold this professional trade show and named " IP Comm Asia " for the global market opportunity this year .
#Text=Continued with " IP Comm Asia " , how this show connect with " 2007 WiMAX Forum Taipei Showcase & Conference " ?

column1: #Text=Communication and networking ( including WiMAX ) industries should be complementaries .

#Text=In Taiwan , IP telecommunication infrastructure should n't be looked down , with the trendy change of telecommunication industry , even though traditional telecommunication ( fax and phone ) industry is currently in a prior position , but IP telecommunication will be a new industry besides of communication and networking with computing technology .
#Text=If consumers can communicate via Internet including Wi-Fi , its development will take advantage .

#Text=Currently , some of telecommunication companies tried to change the quality of VoIP and experiment related applications for the market preparation , if the wireless network contained broadly and WiMAX infrastructure improved rapidly in Taiwan , I think that IP telecommunications will be the main stream in the future .
#Text=Something interesting .
#Text=Some of electronic trade shows held by TAITRA had a great transformation with combinations and changes such as a 3-in-1 show ( TaiwanRFID , TAITRONICS , PV Taiwan ) held past 2 weeks .

#Text=Recently , TAITRA set " Broadband Communications Pavilion " at 2007 TAITRONICS Autumn to promote " Broadband Taiwan 2008 " at TWTC Nangang and recruit companies with Taiwan Electrical and Electronic Manufacturers ' Association .

column1: #Text=How the TCA think about this idea ?
#Text=With trendy changes of electronic industry in Taiwan , several ( electronic ) trade shows suspended or transformed to other industry shows .
#Text=As of TAITRA , they should fill up vacancies with some specified trade shows by some grown up industries .
#Text=With their idea , they successfully transformed a simple electronic show to a grand combination with multiple industries ' show .
#Text=As you talked about the pavilion at TAITRONICS , this was a great chance for TAITRA to reposition and restart .
#Text=Every show organizer always hopes their ( international ) show can keep good images for international buyers .
#Text=Hope TWTC Nangang can bring a bright future and have a good start , and TAITRA can complete solutions for TWTC Nangang to keep TWTC Exhibition Hall in a steady position .
#Text=Nice thanks .
#Text=Hope I can visit some good shows by TCA .
#Text=Summary
#Text=TCA surely worked hard with promoting IT industry by executing governmental plans and holding trade shows at TWTC or outside of Taiwan .
#Text=That 's why the IT industry in Taiwan can market to the world .
#Text=TCA usually reposition some IT trade shows from quantity ( factor ) to quality with holding shows .
#Text=Exhibition organizers in Taiwan should respect quality of exhibitions and conventions so that Taiwan can be visible world-wide in the future .

#Text=With Du 's words , if Computex Taipei should use twin halls , then TAITRA should solve the main issue of Nangang 's traffic as Commissioner Luo said to keep them in a steady position , origins and quality .
